Leica SL Rear Wheel Mapping to ISO /!/ Unless I've got this wrong you can't remap the rear wheel to ISO.

Is that something that they can change with a firmware update or is there a hack for me to change it to what I need ?

I've only just got my Leica SL so I apologise if this topic has been done to death....
